html:
3.29.19  1:11 pm   3.28.19  1:31 pm

Isn't it a little disingenuous to call the release of the page a secret thing nobody knew about when indeed many people, both on this questions page and elsewhere on the interwebs, knew about the artifacts page and were highly expecting it?
3.29.19  12:34 pm   What do you use to work on?
3.29.19  12:13 pm   what does your yelling voice sound like
3.29.19  11:50 am   When will you talk about velcro
3.29.19  11:41 am   How often do you listen to your own music after releasing it for fun?
3.29.19  10:20 am   would you like a free ham

3.29.19  9:53 am   if i were to make music without knowing how it works would that be a viable way to make music? like if i just put notes together without knowing if they go their or not, is that going to ruin the song?
3.29.19  9:37 am   So is it true the earth is a failure,
3.29.19  8:56 am   Do you spend time explicitly thinking about the "quiet" space (musical rests) in your songs?
3.29.19  7:27 am   Do you feel like revealing your process via livestream might take away some of the magic?
3.29.19  7:02 am   where are my innards
3.29.19  5:50 am   how's the mission statement coming along?

3.29.19  2:40 am   You've talked about doing that little singing exercise when you go on walks and stuff, do you still do it when you walk by/near other people? I like to sing when I'm walking around outside also but often I feel self-conscious and don't want everyone to think I'm some crazy person (I mean I sort of am, but I don't want them to know that) you know what I mean?
3.29.19  1:12 am   do you agree that one of the best ways to make a good product is to take a bad idea and stick with it
3.29.19  1:08 am   do you ever want to run into a cornfield to catch your dreams?
3.29.19  12:17 am   i suffer from 'tunnel vision' and i can't tell if the rhythm of my song makes sense to the listener. how do i establish rhythmic context to introduce a 'jumpy' melody?
3.28.19  11:55 pm   what do you say to someone who wants to do music but also feels like it's not profitable
3.28.19  11:36 pm   Can people eat Milky Way Galaxy?
3.28.19  10:51 pm   What do you think about Physics?
3.28.19  10:42 pm   how do i cope with having a first name that is also an improper noun? surely you have some lived experience with this. please help
3.28.19  10:41 pm   what is the correct time to heat porridge
3.28.19  10:28 pm   opinion on frogs?
3.28.19  10:25 pm   Fill in the blank: "if there is one thing I have learned from doing this questions page, it is____________"
3.28.19  9:42 pm   Which bay does "got a home by the bay" reference
3.28.19  8:59 pm   Do you ever want to make a high-budget movie that features many of your songs and references to your past videos?
3.28.19  8:52 pm   The title "might quit" sounds very similar to "The Mighty Quinn." Is there a particular reason for that?

3.28.19  6:05 pm   I'm trying to analyze music and getting overwhelmed by how much... stuff... is going on at one time. Even with sheet music it's like that part is doing what where why how. Got any recs for beginner-friendly but still good music to analyze preferably with freely available sheet music?
3.28.19  6:04 pm   honestly i cannot believe that I've been checking this website every day for the artifacts page and the ONE day i don't, it was they day it was actually there

3.28.19  5:40 pm   Can you please write a song that never uses the I chord? I'd love to hear it!

ok

3.28.19  4:55 pm   Favorite Bob Dylan moment?

this
3.28.19  2:12 pm   3.27.19  8:07 pm you can use OBS (Open Broadcaster Software) to facilitate a connection between a camera capture and Twitch. Does that help?
3.28.19  1:31 pm   What's the context for Dream of Evil?
3.28.19  1:31 pm   3.27.19  11:53 am Not the asker of this question, but what were you hoping to accomplish by making the artifacts page un-live?

3.28.19  1:28 pm   How long is your long, long, long journey? Because you have to turn back. You said this in one of your videos:"Then I rolled to the wilderness where I'm going to stay.". Will you come back? I hope you do.
3.28.19  1:05 pm   What are videos?
3.28.19  12:38 pm   3.27.19  8:07 pm   Ah then you need a technical advisor for twitch.
3.28.19  12:19 pm   how does the fact that some of your fans think you're an all knowing god impact your life
3.28.19  12:13 pm   3.27.19  11:53 am Oh no! Whyyyyyyyyy? Please don't punish the rest of us because you're unhappy with this person :(
3.28.19  11:33 am   3.27.19  8:07 pm wait okay what do you need help with?
3.28.19  11:13 am   What is your opinion on the fact that the Andromeda Galaxy will inevitably crash into our own?
3.28.19  11:11 am   do you ever fear that making your schedule more strict will just end up with you making less content instead

3.28.19  10:09 am   Over the years I feel like jazz has lost it's meaning a bit. Now anything with a bit of extra flavour here and there is being described as jazz or jazzy. How would you describe 'jazz'?
3.28.19  8:04 am   If you have no idea what to livestream, you could always stream the editing process of your videos. Could stop the onslaught of questions asking "How do you make your videos?"
3.28.19  7:20 am   If someone made some music you strongly enjoyed and/or paid you a lot of money, would you consider doing some kind of guest feature on somebody else's song?
3.28.19  7:12 am   are you still considering quitting
3.28.19  7:01 am   3.26.19  8:04 pm I HAVE STAFF PAPER. next step pls
3.28.19  5:53 am   When was the last time you went into creative hyperdrive?
3.28.19  5:53 am   3.27.19  11:53 am why would you betray all your fans and unrelease a page just because one hater thought you asked the questions yourself?
3.28.19  5:42 am   Do you think people sometimes overthink or overcomplicate music theory?
3.28.19  4:42 am   did you have music lessons growing up
